author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE BECOMES A HURRICANE... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE BECOMES A HURRICANE... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 18.2, -155.3
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
